Image (pysar.image)¶

Functions¶

Decimate (look) 2D images (pysar.image.looks)¶

look(data, win[, null, verbose]) Incoherent averaging (looking) routine
look2D(data, win[, null, verbose]) Incoherent averaging (looking) routine

Generate a mask from a 2d polygon (pysar.image.mask_tools)¶

poly2mask(polygon,imdim,imtype=np.float32) Generate a region-of-interest mask from a polygon.
ll2mask(...) Generate a region-of-interest mask from a polygon whose vertices are given in lat/lon.
xy2mask(polygon,imdim,imtype=np.float32) Generate a region-of-interest mask from a polygon given in xy image coordinates.
buffermask(mask,width,dx=1.,dy=1.) Add or remove a buffer zone from a binary mask

Write some standard formats (pysar.image.write)¶

writeHDF5(z, filename[, x, y, dataname]) Write binary data to an HDF5 file
writeNetCDF(z, filename[, x, y, null, ...]) Write binary data to a NetCDF file
writeRaster(z, filename[, filetype, x, y, ...]) Write binary data to a GeoTiff file
writeGeoTiff(z, filename[, x, y, null, coords]) Write binary data to a GeoTiff file
writeBinary(data, filename) Write 2D data to a headerless binary file
writeMultiBand2d(datalist, filename[, inter]) Write 2D data to multiband headerless binary file

Read some standard formats (pysar.image.read)¶

readHDF5(filename[, dataid, rtrnxy]) Return binary data from a single band HDF5 file
readNetCDF(filename[, dataid, rtrnxy]) Return binary data from a single band NetCDF file

Scripts¶

sarlooks 2D image decimation
sarfilter 2D image filtering
